metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11644 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the ReadMATImage() function in coders/mat.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0105-CVE-2017-11644.patch in unstable 0257-CVE-2017-11644-Fix-memory-leak-in-convert-ReadMATImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
